game_description: Choose your starting castle! Build walls to surround the perimeter of your base and place cannons in your territory to defend against waves of incoming ships. Ramcastle is a classic strategy & cannon blasting experience being developed by CuriousVR. MULTIPLAYER UPDATE: available now!
review_1: Really enjoyable game. The single player mode is great with quite a few maps to play. The Tetris elements are really good and scratch that Tetris itch quite well. PvP is super fun as well, it gets really intense. Highly recommend.
review_2: This is a fun little game with a lot of potential. It still needs a bit of polish, but i was happy to buy this game and support the developer as this brought back a lot of nostalgia for me. Keep up the good work!
review_3: Loved rampart as a kid and I am glad to see it still is recognized. Hope for multiplayer one day!
review_4: This game has a lot of potential if the little bugs are works out here and there.
review_5: I didn't know about Rampart until I found Ramcastle. I'm a little addicted now :P
